title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy S22 now $100 off, first cash Galaxy Tab S8/+ discounts, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are now live with Samsung’s new Galaxy S22 smartphone at $100 off. That’s alongside the first cash discounts on its Galaxy Tab S8/+ tablets as well as Google Nest Wifi routers from $139. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy S22 now $100 off, first cash Galaxy Tab S8/+ discounts, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: At $100 off, Amazon is now offering a Samsung Galaxy S22 discount with bundled $100 credit attached alongside today's other best deals.
